event.description: David DeJesus strikes out swinging.
Willie Bloomquist doubles (10) on a fly ball to right fielder Magglio Ordonez.
Billy Butler walks.
Miguel Olivo walks. Willie Bloomquist to 3rd. Billy Butler to 2nd.
With Alberto Callaspo batting, passed ball by Alex Avila, Willie Bloomquist scores. Billy Butler to 3rd. Miguel Olivo to 2nd.
Alberto Callaspo homers (10) on a fly ball to left center field. Billy Butler scores. Miguel Olivo scores.
Mitch Maier strikes out swinging.
John Buck singles on a line drive to center fielder Curtis Granderson.
Alex Gordon lines out to left fielder Carlos Guillen.
Pitcher Change: Zach Miner replaces Jarrod Washburn.

David DeJesus strikes out swinging.
Willie Bloomquist flies out to center fielder Curtis Granderson.

Alberto Callaspo called out on strikes.
Pitcher Change: Casey Fien replaces Zach Miner.
Mitch Maier grounds out, shortstop Adam Everett to first baseman Miguel Cabrera.
John Buck hits a ground-rule double (10) on a fly ball to left-center field.
Alex Gordon walks.
Yuniesky Betancourt flies out to center fielder Curtis Granderson. John Buck to 3rd.

Dusty Ryan remains in the game as the catcher.
